sentence.Network_cn: 暴饮暴食是七宗罪之一。

sentence.Network_en: A bellyful of gluttony will never study willingly.
Gluttony kill more than the sword.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 本段暴食(gluttony)症的的主要特征　　 暴食症1.反复发作的阵发性暴食，在短时间内吃掉大量的食物，进食量远远超过正常。
七君王饕餮(Gluttony)巴鲁赛巴布 （Beelzebul） 又名 Baal-Zebul 地狱的鬼王苍蝇王七君主之首（大概是）巴尔的原型贪婪(Greed)  …

list.abs: Curiosity is a sort of gluttony ., 好奇是一种食欲.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French glutonie, from gluton 'glutton'

entry.def: Gluttony is the act or habit of eating too much and being greedy.

example.tran: 暴饮暴食是七宗罪之一。

means.word_mean: 2. eating to excess (personified as one of the deadly sins)

A bellyful of gluttony will never study willingly.
